definitions: a person who makes fun of or provokes others in a playful or unkind way.
shortDefinitions: person who makes fun of or provokes others in playful or unkind way

definitions: a person who tempts someone sexually with no intention of satisfying the desire aroused.
shortDefinitions: person who tempts someone sexually with no intention of satisfying desire aroused

definitions: an inferior stallion or ram used to excite mares or ewes before they are served by the stud animal.
shortDefinitions: inferior stallion or ram used to excite mares or ewes before they are served by stud animal

definitions: a lure or bait trailed behind a boat to attract fish

examples.text: the fish followed the teaser to within thirty feet of the boat

shortDefinitions: lure or bait trailed behind boat to attract fish

definitions: a short introductory advertisement for a product, especially one that does not mention the name of the thing being advertised

examples.text: promotional teasers in every commercial break

shortDefinitions: short introductory advertisement for product that stimulates interest by remaining cryptic

definitions: a difficult or tricky question or task

examples.text: the teams get the chance to pose the opposition some teasers
